author: jonathan
msg: Fixed validation errors due to problems with the original template - mainly id/class confusion.

author: bago
msg: Remove System.outs from default verification method (JDKIM-14).

author: bago
msg: Added basic support for t= parameter (signature timestamp) in the signature record (JDKIM-15)

author: veithen
msg: WSCOMMONS-518 / AXIS2-4603: Only allow unwrapping of selected XMLStreamReader wrappers and use a specialized API (XOPUtils#getXOPEncodedStream) to unwrap XOPDecodingStreamReader.
